# identityDataPassword

**Instance Property**

The password for the PKCS12 tunneling protocol authentication credentials.

## Declaration

```swift
var identityDataPassword: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If the PKCS12 data set in the [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEVPNProtocol/identityData] property uses a password for encryption, you must specify the password here.

## Authenticating the user

- **username**: The user name component of the tunneling protocol authentication credential.
- **passwordReference**: A persistent keychain reference to a keychain item containing the password component of the tunneling protocol authentication credential.
- **identityReference**: A persistent keychain reference to a keychain item containing the certificate and private key components of the tunneling protocol authentication credential.
- **identityData**: The certificate and private key components of the tunneling protocol authentication credential, in PKCS12 format.
